message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider $95?
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105.
